  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, org.jgrapht.Graph<TopoNode,TopoLink>

    public class TopoGraph
extends org.jgrapht.graph.WeightedMultigraph<TopoNode,TopoLink>
implements java.io.Serializable
    This graph is maintained for the EdgeKeeper.

    sbhunia

      • updateEdge

        public void updateEdge(TopoNode start,
                       TopoNode dest,
                       java.lang.String startIP,
                       java.lang.String destIP,
                       java.lang.Double etx,
                       java.lang.String destSession,
                       java.lang.Integer destSeq,
                       java.lang.String sessionID,
                       java.lang.Integer seqNo,
                       java.lang.Double Senderprcv)
        This function updates an edge ETX for a particular link
        Parameters:
        start - the start node for this link
        dest - the destination node for this link
        startIP - IP of start node for this link
        destIP - IP of the destination node for this link
        etx - The ETX value (If the start node is resident node then ETX is calculated in this function)
        sessionID -
        seqNo -
        Senderprcv - Sender's advertised Prcv for this link
